column2: my husband proposed to me in August of 2013 - we knew we wanted a short engagement and literally just picked the weekend after my birthday in March (3/15 to be exact). After we got engaged and waited about a week
column3: we already knew that CBBR would be it
column4: we love the restaurant and the food and the tapas/family style plates and casual atmoshpere. Picking CBBR was just as easy as saying yes to him. Sure we had other places in mind (Carnivale
column5: Tapas Valencia) but CBBR was more us. And it was important to us that we keep it personal
column6: like we were just throwing a party. Traditional we are NOT. Plus
column7: communication with CBBR was timely and friendly
column8: which matters when you plan a wedding 6 months away.
